CustomField.description: The "domain" that this process arrangement is related to. Usually this is the related SObject API name, especially in a Trigger Execution, but it is not limited to just that.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The "domain" that this process arrangement is related to. Usually this is the related SObject API name, especially in a Trigger Execution, but it is not limited to just that.
CustomField.label: Related Domain
